content:
Yes, UPenn School of Medicine has a website where you can learn more about specific projects, ongoing research, and giving opportunities. Here is a link to their Advancement and Giving page, which contains information on their various giving opportunities: https://www.pennmedicine.org/giving/advancement-and-giving

On this page, you can find more detailed information on the research areas I mentioned earlier and the specific projects they are currently working on, as well as how you can support their efforts through donations or other means. Additionally, the website has a search tool that allows you to look for specific research areas or programs within the UPenn School of Medicine.

If you have any further questions or would like more information, you can also contact the UPenn School of Medicine's development office directly, and they can provide additional guidance on giving options and opportunities to support their research efforts.
